content.content:
Dear Backers,
 We are deeply grateful for your generous pledges that enabled us to reach the target amount on Kickstarter in just 1.5 hours.
 Above all, we wish to express our thanks to every single person who supported our project. Your trust and support have played a crucial role in our success. You not only helped us surpass our goal but also unlocked greater opportunities and possibilities for our project.
As a way of thanking our backers, we would like to introduce Kickbooster & PledgeBoost to you.
